breakdowns.description: Fetches energy generation data from a provided endpoint every 1 minute, stores timestamped energy data in the database, and retries failed requests automatically while logging errors.
conditions: Data must be fetched every 1 minute from the provided endpoint.
Fetched data must be timestamped and stored in the database.
Failed requests must be retried automatically.

breakdowns.description: Allows users to register with basic information and requires submission of a picture of the energy source and supporting documents (PDF/image) during onboarding. Uploaded files are validated for type and size. Access to the home page is granted only after successful onboarding.
conditions: Users must register with basic information.
User must have an email ID and the email ID must be valid.
Users must submit a picture of the energy source during onboarding.
Users must submit supporting documents (PDF/image) during onboarding.
Uploaded files must be validated for type and size.
Access to the home page is granted only after successful onboarding.

breakdowns.description: Displays the current energy generated for the user's energy source on the home page and allows users to view historical energy data in table or chart format.
conditions: Home page must display current energy generated for the user's energy source.
Users must be able to view historical energy data in table or chart format.
